version_description:
All new app experience by celebrity golf instructor Jim McLean!
New FREE Lesson.
Our algorithms have been adapted comparing your swing to the Jim McLean teaching system.
New Golf Courses module with GPS, ratings and reviews.
New subscription model to make learning easy and consistent.
Enjoy!

Many new fixes since our launch!
Videos will upload faster and your first free lesson now has better video detection features.
The golf courses module has quicker GPS features and ratings has been fixed.
We'll keep working hard to make this app better every day!

FINALLY the front-facing-camera feature is now available!!! Go ahead and film yourself!
We also fixed a bug that was closing the app when saving a recorded video on the iPhone6Pus and 7Plus.
Videos will now upload even faster and your first free lesson has better video detection features.
We'll keep working hard to make this app better every day!
Remember your feedback is always welcomed!

Thanks to all our golfing friends our social network keeps growing and thousands of swings are getting boosted!
The long awaited front-facing-camera feature is a success!!! Go ahead and film yourself!
A new super cool registration screen has been added.
More recording options for our subscription customers.

We also fixed a bug that was closing the app when saving a recorded video on the iPhone6Pus and 7Plus.
Videos will now upload even faster and your first free lesson has even better video detection features.

We'll always keep working hard to make this app better every day!
Remember your feedback is always welcomed!

Thanks for boosting your swing with us!
We're always working hard to make your app experience better!

This update includes a a consistent and more modern look & feel. White backgrounds without cluttered images making the app run even faster.
We also kept the new lesson buying circuit offering a free swing analysis.

Thanks to all the loyal users who keep boosting their swings anywhere!
